Configuration.Name: 20241221_L1=L2=20m_lens_med
Configuration.SetupScript:
#sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/setspeed 17449') #sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength 8.1') config.wavelength = 8.1 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 19250 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 30 config.guide = 'lens' config.apx = -98 config.bs = 5 config.beamcenterx = 91.66 config.beamcenterz = 93.01
config.drive()
